description:
Let your bike carry the load. This classic triangular frame bag carries essential gear like snacks, a lock, pump and tools. It's easy to mount with hook-and-loop straps. Reflective touches on the sides and zippers help you stay visible when your bike crawl keeps you out past dark.

  • Secures to bike with 4 hook-and-loop straps
  • U-shaped zipper pulls are easy to use with gloves on
  • Zippered main pocket features an internal mesh organizer and key clip
  • Second zippered pocket is great for stashing valuables like your wallet, keys and phone
  • Reflective panels for visibility
  • Designed to fit bike frames with a horizontal top tube
name: MEC World Tour Frame Bag
